title: Thin nuxt blog template
author: Brian Reichholf
tagline:
Data Scientist by day
Molecular Biology PhD by night
description: A minimalist blog template rendering markdown blog entries including code highlighting. CSS powered by Tailwind.

_profile_comments._general: Links above will be parsed and placed in that order
_profile_comments._link_combination: If you add new links, you will need a base item below to append the profile to.
_profile_comments._profile_names: With the exception of github and scholar, the profile names will be used to retrieve the path from entypo svg files.
